title: Looking to buy some T206 SGC 50 commons
author: vintagetoppsguy

posts.post_title: Looking to buy some T206 SGC 50 commons
posts.post_content:
I am just starting this set and I am looking to buy about 4-6 SGC 50 graded commons.  Looking for well centered cards without creases.  Let me kow if you have any.

Thanks!

David

I have about 15 - 20 of that grade listed on my website for sale.   The banner below is a link to the site / T206 page:

[URL="http://cassidyssportscards.webs.com/t20619091911.htm"][IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/CassidysSportscardsBanner.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
